name: National Geographic Guide des Lieux historiques nationaux du Canada
categories: Guide des Lieux historiques nationaux du Cana
description: The official companion book to Canada's 150th anniversary, it celebrates the historic sites that are key to the nation's story. It featrues 236 national historic sites of Parks Canada, with full-colour photographs, maps, lodgings, activities, re-enactments and contact information.  Enjoy Canada's birthday by exploring its heritage and historic sites. Text is in French.
